creator.name: Immenroth, Eckhard

description: With the Heubach method free floating dust of treated seeds can be measured. The Heubach value is used as an indicator for seed quality. One way to make the heubach results more reliable can be the definition of the limit of detection (LOD) and the limit of quantification (LOQ). Blank measurements were conducted in several heubach labs for this data collection to allow a calculation of LOD and LOQ for the Heubach method. Wheat seeds were used for the contamination of the testing device. Two Tests (Data_LOD_LOQ_wheat.xlsx) were performed following the EU-Code of Practise for the monitoring of floating dust of treated seeds (Version 05.1, published by the Seed Treatment Stewardship Steering Committee (STICCS Group) on 1st August 2021). The material and methods used are described in Material_and_methods_wheat.pdf and the procedure for estimation of LOD and LOQ for Heubach seed abrasion dust method is described in Procedure_for_the_estimation_of_LOD_and_LOQ_wheat.pdf.
headline: Data set: blank values from heubach dustmeter-testing wheat
name: Data set: blank values from heubach dustmeter-testing wheat

additionalProperty.name: cropVariety
additionalProperty.description: A plant grouping, within a single botanical taxon of the lowest known rank, defined by the reproducible expression of its distinguishing and other genetic characteristics. A formal rank in botanical taxonomic nomenclature.

additionalProperty.name: cropThousandSeedWeight
additionalProperty.description: The thousand-seed weight (TSW) is the weight of 1000 pure seeds from the submitted sample.

variableMeasured.name: Lab
variableMeasured.description: Laboratory A-D which performed the test

variableMeasured.name: Empl
variableMeasured.description: Employee A or B in the same lab, who performed the test

variableMeasured.name: Weight
variableMeasured.description: Weigth oft he filter holder in gram (g)

variableMeasured.name: Humidity
variableMeasured.description: Air humidity in the lab in percent (%)

variableMeasured.name: Temperature
variableMeasured.description: Temperature in the lab in Grad Celsius (°C)

variableMeasured.name: Empty Weight
variableMeasured.description: Weight of the filter holder in gram (g) before the heubach cycle

variableMeasured.name: Full Weight
variableMeasured.description: Weight of the filter holder in gram (g) after the heubach cycle

variableMeasured.name: Weight delta
variableMeasured.description: full weight - empty weight; weight difference resulting from the Heubach cycle

variableMeasured.name: Seed Weight
variableMeasured.description: Weight of the seeds in gram (g) which were filled in the drum of the heubach device for the contamination cycle

variableMeasured.name: Heubach Value SeedLot 1
variableMeasured.description: Heubach value of seed lot 1; determined according to the heubach method

variableMeasured.name: g/100kg
variableMeasured.description: Amount of dust in grams (g) per 100 kilogram (kg) of wheat seeds
